about_the_company: Our client is a growing Medical Device company located in Parsippany, NJ.
job_responsibilities: Implementing embedded controllers using Microcontrollers for various image capture systems
Experience with Capture schematics, PCB layout, routing and (PADs) tools
Working closely with the manufacturing team to ensure through documentation and for production of products
required_hard_skills: XilinxAlteraLattice High speed FPGA and SOC and microprocessor like MSP430TM4CNXP IMX family
Layout or Layout guidance for PCB designer
Test tools for signal integrity, EMC etc.
PCB Design (preferably PAD) Schematic Capture and layout
required_education: Bachelor's degree in Electrical or Electronics Engineering (or similar)
